steps: Simplify: small_cbet_33 on static, half_pot_50 on many turns; add delay_turn and protect_check_range
Reserve big_bet_75 for dynamic turns with blockers; ladders unchanged
After bad beat; tilt guard active
Discipline: fold vs big_bet_75 without blockers; earlier protect_check_range to avoid auto-stabs
Thin value uses size_down_dry; no off-tree sizes
Preflop ladders steady; trim bluff 3-bets without blockers
Postflop: small_cbet_33 on static; big_bet_75 only on dynamic with equity/blockers
